item.Description: Health potion: recover part of your life when using it.
Mana potion: recover part of your magic when using it.
Clover: recover your full life and magic when using it.
Small key: open some of the locked doors.
Horse: you can ride it on outside maps.
Dino fly: you can fly it on outside maps.
Protopack: can be used to fly over water.
Feather, you can use it to write letters.

item.Subject: My house key
item.Description: Note to myself: here is an extra key from my house in the case I loose mine again.
Oil, used by cars and motorbike.
Ferry ticket, you need one to take the ferry.
Glass of Champagne: there is nothing better to celebrate!
Glass of Gluwein: this can keep you warm for the evening.
Christmas candy cane: you can not get enough of this sweets.
Lbanet Christmas 2009 gift: it seems to be nothing inside yet...
